pages.original_text: Kerala State IT Mission Department of Information Technology Government of Kerala Thiruvananthapuram PROCEEDINGS OF THE DIRECTOR, KERALA STATE IT MISSION, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM Present: ANU KUMARI I A S Sub: KSITM- Nomination of Officials for attending department meeting -reg. No:- Admn-Estt/36/2020-KSITM Thiruvananthapuram,16-05-2023 Read: 1. SysAdmin/54/2017-KSITM/1127 dated 19.09.2017 2.
